name: Tails Air Ride
description:
Battle in the sky.  Play as Tails from the Sonic the Hedgehog series in a solo adventure against Dr. Robotnik.

Created when I was much younger and a huge sonic the hedgehog fan. The game will not be updated but maybe remade in the future.

Instructions

- Do not run out of lives

- Collect rings for points

- Destroy enemies for extra points

- Collect ammo boxes for more ammo

- Destroy Eggman if he is present on the level

- Go through the big ring on the right side of the level to continue.

Controls

- Space to shoot

- Arrow keys to move

- T to pause

- M to Mute

Extras

- After Beating the game, stay until after the credits for a bonus endless attack level.
